g.text: Phase 2: Heredoc Processing and File Creation
Phase 3: Input Reading and Processing Loop
• Scan for '$' followed by valid identifier (check_id())
• Extract variable name using variable_skip() and subs()
• Replace with value using strj() concatenation
• EOF: Normal exit, clean close of file descriptors
Phase 4: File Descriptor Return and Integration

svg.text: Continue reading until delimiter or EOF
